name: Ashes
story: A mother ashes keep by her son. regretting that he can’t repay her enough, these ashes reminding him about his mother’s warmth.
ending: Looking at the label on the urn. You see a name, a woman's name. You start to remember about the past, regretting and crying, you wish you could see her, your mother again. You keep repeating sorry to your dead mother, like a broken record.
